faq.answer: A Tesla Powerwall stores 13.5 kWh of energy, typically sufficient to power essential circuits in most Suffield homes for 8-12 hours. During our assessment, we calculate exact backup duration based on your household's specific consumption patterns.

You'll continue running on stored solar energy, and during daylight hours, your panels keep charging the batteries. The system automatically reconnects when Eversource power returns.
